text: An Essay on Matisse is a 1996 American short documentary film directed by Perry Wolff. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 independent films Category:1996 films Category:1990s short documentary films Category:American short documentary films Category:American films Category:American documentary films Category:American independent films Category:English-language films Category:Documentary films about visual artists Category:Henri Matisse
title: An Essay on Matisse
